weekly_top_story.headline: California to Begin Selling Affordable, State-Branded Insulin
weekly_top_story.summary: California will start selling affordable, state-branded insulin on January 1, marking a significant effort to reduce insulin costs, which affects millions and reflects a broader trend towards cost control in pharmaceuticals.

stories.headline: CMS Announces Claims Hold for Certain Services After Oct. 1, 2025
stories.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services has instructed Medicare Administrative Contractors to temporarily hold claims for services impacted by the expiration of certain healthcare extenders, affecting telehealth and FQHC claims.
